scripts.build-sass-dev: node-sass --importer=node_modules/node-sass-tilde-importer theme/styles/index.scss --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 public/assets/styles/index.css
scripts.build-css-dev: npm run build-sass-dev && postcss public/assets/styles/index.css --use autoprefixer --replace
scripts.build-css: npm run build-sass && postcss public/assets/styles/index.css --use autoprefixer cssnano --replace --no-map
scripts.build-gutenberg-css: npm run build-gutenberg-sass && postcss public/assets/styles/gutenberg.css --use autoprefixer cssnano --replace --no-map
